meta.description: MPLAB® Code Configurator

meta.name: AVR® MCUs
meta.description: AVR® MCUs Description

meta.name: MCP19XXXX
meta.description: MCP19XXXX Description

meta.name: PIC10 / PIC12 / PIC16 / PIC18 MCUs
meta.description: PIC10 / PIC12 / PIC16 / PIC18 MCUs Description

meta.name: PIC24 / dsPIC33 / PIC32MM MCUs
meta.description: MCC Classic Device Peripheral Library for PIC24 / dsPIC33 / PIC32MM MCUs

meta.name: 16-bit Bootloader
meta.description: Bootloader for the dsPIC/PIC24 products.

meta.name: 8-bit Bootloader
meta.description: The 8-bit Bootloader Library enables creation of bootloaders for 8-bit MCUs.

meta.name: AVR-IoT AWS Sensor Node
meta.description: AVR-IoT AWS Sensor Node is a secure, Wi-Fi connected solution for an IoT node that enables data transfer between a sensor node and the AWS Cloud platform.

meta.name: AVR-IoT Google Sensor Node
meta.description: AVR-IoT Google Sensor Node is a secure, Wi-Fi connected solution for an IoT node that enables data transfer between a sensor node and the Google Cloud platform.

meta.name: Crypto Authentication Library
meta.description: The CryptoAuthentication Library allows quick and easy configuration and code generation for security, cryptography, authentication, and encryption applications using Microchip's Secure chip line.

meta.name: DAC
meta.description: The DAC (Digital to Analog Converter) library for Microchip’s MPLAB® X allows for quick and easy C code generation for Microchip’s Digital to Analog converters.

meta.name: Data Encryption Routines
meta.description: The Data Encryption Routine Library provides data encryption routines based on four encryption algorithms (AES, XTEA, SKIPJACK and Pseudo-random binary sequence generator.)

meta.name: File System
meta.description: FatFs File System Library for FAT/FAT32/EXFAT and SD Card applications

meta.name: X2C Scope
meta.description: The Library that provides features to use X2C Scope,.The X2C Scope, a virtual oscilloscope, is an intuitive tool for online data visualisation and debugging.

meta.name: X2C Library
meta.description: The X2C framework provides an easy model driven software development method, which is a good tool to create complex control algorithms, build complex mathematical systems and for fast prototyping.

meta.name: Foundation Services
meta.description: The Foundation Services library provides basic software drivers.

meta.name: LIN
meta.description: The LIN (Local Interconnect Network) is a basic UART driver that allows transfer of UART packets formatted using the LIN protocol.

meta.name: MCP794XX I2C RTCC
meta.description: MCP794XX I2C RTCC Description

meta.name: MCP802X
meta.description: The MCP802X Library Plug-in for MCC allows for quick and easy C code generation for interfacing with the MCP802X family (3-Phase Brushless DC Motor Gate Drivers) via UART interface.

meta.name: Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT)
meta.description: Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) library supports MQTT client implementation.

meta.name: MikroElektronika Click Library
meta.description: The MikroElektronika Click library provides software drivers for many of the Click development boards provided by MikroElektronika.

meta.name: Board Support Library
meta.description: The Board Support Library is the library for MCC Boards and Off Chip Peripherals.

meta.name: motorBench® Development Suite
meta.description: The motorBench® Development Suite is a GUI-based software development tool for Field Oriented Control (FOC), performing accurate measurement of critical motor parameters, automatic tuning of feedback control gains and generating source code for an MPLAB® X IDE project, utilizing the Motor Control Application Framework (MCAF).

meta.name: mTouch® Capacitive Sensing
meta.description: The mTouch™ Capacitive Sensing Library allows for quick and easy C code generation of Microchip's capacitive sensing software library.

meta.name: PAC193x Library
meta.description: The PAC193x library for Microchip’s MPLAB® X allows for quick and easy C code generation for interfacing with the PAC193x Current and Power Monitor ICs via I2C.

meta.name: PIC-IoT WG Sensor Node
meta.description: PIC-IoT WG Sensor Node is a secure, Wi-Fi connected solution enabling data transfer between a sensor node and the Google Cloud Platform.

meta.name: RN4870 | RN4871 BLE Module
meta.description: The RN4870|1 BLE Module allows quick and easy configuration and code generation for bluetooth applications using Microchip's RN4870/1 Bluetooth Low Energy Modules.

meta.name: Serial Memory Products
meta.description: Serial Memory Products Description

meta.name: SMPS Power Library
meta.description: The SMPS Library is a set of generic fundamental SMPS building blocks and topologies for 8-bit PIC SMPS applications.

meta.name: TCP/IP Lite Stack
meta.description: The TCPIP-Lite library allows for quick and easy configuration and code generation of the latest TCP/IP Lite stack.

meta.name: Temperature Sensor
meta.description: The Temperature Sensor Library for MPLAB® Code Configurator allows for quick and easy C code generation to configure and communicate with a temperature sensor.

meta.name: Turnkey Touch
meta.description: The Turnkey Touch Library for Microchip’s MPLAB® X Code Configurator allows for quick and easy C code driver generation for Microchip’s capacitive touch turnkey devices. The library generates the I2C host driver code that controls the CAP1xxx devices and reads out touch information.

meta.name: UCS211x
meta.description: UCS211x Description

meta.name: USB Framework Lite
meta.description: Provides USB support for peripheral or host applications based on the devices capabilities.

meta.name: WINC15XX Library
meta.description: The WINC15XX Library supports Microchip's ATWINC15x0 SmartConnect module for Internet of Things (IoT) applications.

meta.name: LoRaWAN
meta.description: LoRaWAN Description

meta.name: AVR IEC60730 Class B Diagnostic Library
meta.description: The AVR IEC60730 Class B Diagnostic Library is a suite of diagnostic tests in compliance with the IEC 60730 Class B functional safety standard.

meta.name: PIC16/18 IEC60730 Class B Diagnostic Library
meta.description: The PIC16/18 IEC60730 Class B Diagnostic Library is a suite of diagnostic tests in compliance with the IEC 60730 Class B functional safety standard.

meta.name: AVR ISO26262 Diagnostic Library
meta.description: The AVR ISO26262 Diagnostic Library is a suite of diagnostic tests implementing the diagnostics mechanisms described in the device's ISO 26262 functional safety manual

meta.name: PIC16/18 ISO26262 Diagnostic Library
meta.description: The PIC16/18 ISO26262 Diagnostic Library is a suite of diagnostic tests implementing the diagnostics mechanisms described in the device's ISO 26262 functional safety manual
